objective1: Tell an anecdote about someone else in response to 3 questions.
objective2: Mention how you solved 2 problems the last time they arose.

objective1: Describe attempting the same solution in 3 scenarios.
objective2: Attempt 3 very similar solutions to the same problem.

objective1: Establish how you got into 3 hypothetical situations.
objective2: Reveal 2 things that qualify you to solve a given problem
